ABOUT_LEGAL_NOTICE: Megacubo does not provide any broadcast. The content in it is provided by IPTV lists added by users to the program. Using this program to access copyrighted content is against its terms of use.
ALLOW_EDIT_CHANNEL_LIST: Allow editing of the channel list
ASK_COMMUNITARY_LIST: WARNING! In Communitary Mode, Megacubo will share lists with other users. When receiving lists from other users, some may be out of date or include unwanted content.
ASK_EXIT: Do you want to close the program?
ASK_IPTV_LIST: Paste below the IPTV list URL
ASK_IPTV_LIST_FIRST: Megacubo is a free and open source IPTV list player. To begin, enter the address of your IPTV list (M3U).
BACKGROUND_VIDEO_BLACK_SCREEN_HINT: If the background becomes black, this video is not HTML5 compliant
CAST_ERR_NO_LIVE: The device {0} does not support live broadcasts, only videos
CAST_LOAD_FAILED: Failed to connect to the device, try again
CHANGE_HOTKEY_MESSAGE: Enter a new key combination for this action or press {0} to cancel...
CLEAR_CACHE_WARNING: By clearing the temporary files ({0}) the lists and icons will be downloaded again, this will slow down the program for the next few minutes. Do you want to proceed?
DATA_FETCHING_FAILURE: Failed to get data, check your connection
DOWNLOAD_CANCEL_CONFIRM: Do you want to cancel the download of the file "{0}"?
DOWNLOAD_START_CONFIRM: Do you want to download the file "{0}"?
DOWNLOAD_START_HINT: You can manage active downloads at "{0}".
ENABLE_PREMIUM_MESSAGE: The version installed does not have special features. To obtain them, download the complete program from our website and install it.
EPG_AVAILABLE_SOON: The EPG will be available in a few minutes...
EPG_BAD_FORMAT: The configured EPG is in the wrong format
EPG_OUTDATED: The configured EPG is out of date
FOLDER_NOT_WRITABLE: Without permission to save to this folder, select another
INSTALL_CORRUPTED: Oops, your installation has corrupted files. Please reinstall the app.
INVALID_URL_MSG: The address informed isn't valid. Try other address
IPTV_INFO: The lists in this section are provided and maintained by a community.
LEAVE_EMPTY: Leave it empty if you don't know
LEGAL_IPTV_INFO: The lists in this section are provided and maintained by a community, as free and legal access lists.
LOW_DISK_SPACE_AVAILABLE: Your device is running out of space ({0} available). This may affect the app performance.
LOW_MEMORY_AVAILABLE: Your device is low on memory ({0} available). This may affect the app performance.
NEW_VERSION_AVAILABLE: A new version of the program is now available. Would you like to download it now?
NONE_STREAM_WORKED_X: No active broadcast found for {0} at this time
NO_MORE_STREAM_WORKED_X: No more active broadcasts were found for {0} at this time
NO_LIST_PROVIDED: You need to add at least one valid IPTV list to the program
OPTION_CHANGE_AT_ANYTIME: P.S: You can change this setting at any time in "{0}".
PERFORMANCE_MODE_MSG:
If your device has low memory, CPU speed or your connection has less than 5Mbps, click below on "{0}".
The "{1}" mode is more effective, but it takes up more memory, battery and CPU, which can get heavy on your device.
PLAYALTERNATE: Find another broadcast for this channel
PREMIUM_ALREADY_ENABLED: Special features are already enabled. Do you want to keep them enabled?
PREMIUM_BALLOON_HINT: Watch on your TV with and record live streams
PREMIUM_OFFER_QUESTION:
Megacubo has special features (Premium) that allow you to watch on your TV and record live streams.

Do you want to enable these features?
RESET_CONFIRM: Do you want to return to the default program settings?
RESTART_LATER: I will restart the app later
SCHEDULE_PROGRAM_RECORDING: Do you want to schedule the recording of this program?
SCHEDULE_TUNING_FAILURE: Failed to tune the channel for the scheduled recording
SCHEDULING_RECORD_WARNING: Attention! The program must be open or in the system tray at this date and time to be able to perform the recording automatically.
SEARCH_MISSING_LOGOS: Search for missing logos in lists
SHOULD_RESTART: Restart Megacubo for the changes to take effect
STARTING_LISTS_FIRST_TIME_WAIT: Starting lists for the first time, please wait...
SUGGEST_COMMUNITARY_LIST: If you don't have an IPTV list, try the Communitary Mode.
SYNC_EPG_CHANNELS_FAILED: Failed to get channel list from EPG
TEST_STREAMS_TYPE: Show broadcast type when testing transmissions
TOS_CONTENT: This software should not be used to access copyrighted content without authorization. If in doubt, check your country's legislation
TRANSCODING_WAIT: Transcoding, please wait a few seconds...
TRANSMISSION_NOT_WORKING_HINT: Transmission problem? Click on {0} to open another broadcast
UNSCHEDULE_PROGRAM_RECORDING: Do you want to cancel the recording of this program?
YOUR_CONNECTION_IS_SLOW: Your connection is slow for this broadcast
YOUR_CONNECTION_IS_SLOW_TIP: Your connection is slow for this broadcast, click {0} to try another one
